element-citation.article-title: Successful implementation of a multicountry clinical surveillance and data collection system for Ebola virus disease in West Africa: findings and lessons learned

ref.mixed-citation: Roshania R, Mallow M, Dunbar N, Mansary D, Shetty P, Lyon T, et al.
